body:
Hello @alanbato! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/indexes/base.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 58:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L58): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 1022:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L1022): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 1978:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L1978): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 2257:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L2257): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 2920:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L2920): [E741](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E741) ambiguous variable name 'l'



 - In the file [`pandas/tests/reshape/test_merge.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/tests/reshape/test_merge.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 919:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/tests/reshape/test_merge.py#L919): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 920:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1560d75f769a296db090a9e25a3c9224b65f8b9f/pandas/tests/reshape/test_merge.py#L920): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def



##### Comment last updated on July 15, 2017 at 18:16 Hours UTC
